title: Cruise Ship Karen
description: This website has information on calls of port for cruise ship itineraries, blogs and advice articles. *nI created a template for the port guide section so that information could be easily added by the writer whenever they write a new guide. *nI also created and edited footage for the YouTube Channel Cruise Ship Karen.

title: Night Health Worker Box
description: On this website, you can buy a subscription based service for a monthly care package designed for night health workers. The website uses the Genesis framework and implements the Subbly platform to handle the ecommerce side of it. *nI have also taught the client to use WordPress so they can update the website themselves with new pictures every month.

title: KarenWorrall.co.uk
description: This is the portfolio website of a writer featuring their services, selected works and testimonials. *nI built the website from the ground up, writing all the JavaScript and CSS myself and implemented third party React libraries. *nThe website takes JSON data for the portfolio, services and testimonials sections and converts it into HTML so more items can easily be added by amending the JSON file.

title: Codex Card Game Demo
description: This is a personal project where I created a working version of the card game Codex on Unity. *nI have taken the card images and manipulated them into interactible game objects and have created scripts to implement the rules of the game. *nThe link above takes you to DropBox where you can download and test the game for yourself.

title: This Website
description: This is my own portfolio website which i'm particualarly proud of the star background. *nThe positions of the stars are based on the Golden Ratio similarly to the way a Sunflower spreads it's seeds. *nClick the triangle on the left and experiment with the controls to see the power of React stateful widgets.
